title: [Simultaneous determination of six flavonoids in Hyperici Japonici Herba by HPCE-DAD].
abstract: To establish a high performance capillary electrophoresis method with diode array detection (HPCE-DAD) for simultaneous determination of rutin, isoquercitrin, hyperoside, quercitrin, kaempferol and quercetin in Hyperici Japonici Herba.
